content.title: Food Safety & Standards Authority Of India (FSSAI) Internship Scheme
content.beneficiary: Students pursuing a full-time Graduate/Post Graduate Degree
content.details: The Internship Program by the FSSAI provides interns with unique learning opportunities in various areas of food regulation of food safety administration. FSSAI is a statutory body established under the Food Safety & Standards Act, 2006 under the aegis of the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Government of India. It is the apex body responsible for ensuring food safety and compliance with food standards across the country.
benefits: Stipend of ₹ 10,000/- for the internship period
Working space and internet facility provided
eligibility: Students pursuing a full-time Graduate/Post Graduate Degree/higher degree from a Recognized Institute within India/abroad in relevant fields
Only 3rd and 4th Year students in Computer Science/Information Technology
Specific qualifications for certain divisions at FSSAI (HQ)
exclusions: Students who have completed the specified courses need not apply
content.application_process: Online application process through the FSSAI website.
documents_required: Letter from Institute indicating student status

faqs.question: What Is The Full Name Of FSSAI?
faqs.answer: The full name of FSSAI is 'Food Safety & Standards Authority of India'.

faqs.question: Under Whose Aegis Is The FSSAI Internship Scheme?
faqs.answer: FSSAI is a statutory body established under the Food Safety & Standards Act, 2006 under the aegis of the Ministry of Health & Family Welfare, Government of India.

faqs.question: What Is The Responsibility Of FSSAI?
faqs.answer: FSSAI is the apex body responsible for ensuring food safety and compliance with food standards across the country.

faqs.question: What Are The Objectives Of This Internship Scheme?
faqs.answer: The Internship Program by the FSSAI provides interns with unique learning opportunities in various areas of food regulation of food safety administration.

faqs.question: How Long Will Be The Tenure Of The Internship?
faqs.answer: The internship will be available throughout the year on a Quarterly basis, offered for a duration of upto 03 months, which may be extended to a maximum period of 06 months.

faqs.question: What Shall Be The Amount Of Stipend For The Interns?
faqs.answer: A stipend of ₹ 10,000/- for the internship period will be given to the deserving Interns.

faqs.question: Will Internet Facility Be Provided To The Interns?
faqs.answer: Yes, FSSAI shall provide working space, internet facility and other necessities.

faqs.question: Will FSSAI Provide Laptops To The Interns?
faqs.answer: No, the Interns would be required to have their own laptops.

faqs.question: When Will The Certificates Be Awarded To The Interns?
faqs.answer: All the interns will be awarded a certificate by the Human Resource Division, FSSAI (HQ) on successful completion of the internship.
